laboratory_examinations.findings: Bilirubin 2.6 upon admission, climbing to 4.5; AlkPhos 185; mild transaminitis (60s-80s).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Bilirubin increased from 2.6 to 4.5 over time.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Liver slightly echogenic, no space-occupying lesions; gallbladder contracted around multiple stones, no significant wall edema.
